publicationStmt.ab: published electronically as part of the TLS project at https://hxwd.org

availability.ab: This work is in the public domain

sourceDesc.ab: Translation of 莊子 into English.

p.seg: LYM 185: 無爲，所以無樂無譽，所以爲至樂至譽，與上富、貴、壽相應。至譽，與上争名相應。(JRW: "He acts not, that is why there is neither joy nor praise, this is what comes to constitute the ultimate joy and ultimate praise. This resonates with the aforementioned 'wealth', 'honor', and 'longevity'. 'Supreme praise' resonates with the aforementioned
